properties.address: Thorpe Acre Road, Loughborough, Leicestershire LE11 4LF
properties.description: Warm and welcoming church hall. There is space for children to play and some games are provided. Refreshments are serviced from 10.00am and at 12 noon a simple lunch is served at a cost of just £1.50. This is hot soup and a roll in winter.
properties.title: All Saints Thorpe Acre Church Hall

properties.address: Beveridge Street, Barrow upon Soar, Loughborough, Leicestershire LE12 8PL

properties.address: Draycott Methodist Church, Derby, Derbyshire DE72 3NB
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th November 2024** Our warm space is open to everyone. Refreshment available from 10am along with soup and a roll for lunch. A very warm welcome from all of us.

properties.address: Parochial Church Hall, Nottinghamshire NG12 5AN
properties.description: Open to all. Accessible to pushchairs, wheelchairs and small scooters. Runs on Fridays 10.00-14.30 from 17th November until Easter. Free hot or cold drinks, biscuits and also sandwiches at lunchtime. Games, toys, books and magazines available or just sit and chat. Feel free to bring your own craftwork or knitting. Quiet room for reading. Free internet. On "The Keyworth" bus route. Community bus transport available on request.
properties.title: Friday Warm Welcome Space

properties.address: Infusion Coffee House, Nottinghamshire NG10 4LB
properties.description: Infusion is open as a warm space every Tuesday to Friday from 10:30am until 3pm. Free Wi-Fi, Device Charging, People to chat to, stay as long as you want during opening, Pay it forward/suspended coffee scheme, space to work, Food/Drink for sale
properties.title: Infusion Coffee House & Community Space

properties.address: CCAN , Coalville, Leicestershire LE67 3TU
